content: Hello Mister Schmidt, my name is Haoyu Wang from China. Thanks for inviting me to see the apartment in Duisburg. Let's talk about the rental price.
name: Haoyu Wang from China

content:
Hello Haoyu,

I'm not interested in negotiating the price yet. Let's first discuss the apartment. It's a newly built unfurnished 50 square meter one-bedroom apartment in the city center. It's close to all important facilities like supermarket, public transportation, etc. Once we have a good understanding of the apartment, we can discuss the rental price.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: Mister Schmidt, I heard that the apartment is in the city center. I am aware that the prices in the city center are usually higher. However, I am a student and I have a limited budget. I am willing to pay 300 euros per month for a nice and quiet apartment like this.
name: Haoyu Wang from China

content: I'm sorry, but 300 euros per month is far too low for this apartment. It's in the city center, and it's a brand new apartment. I am looking for a fair market price that reflects the value of the apartment. Why don't we discuss the features of the apartment again? It's a 50 square meter unfurnished one-bedroom apartment in the city center with easy access to all important facilities. I'm sure we can find a price that works for both of us.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: Mister Schmidt, I understand that the apartment is in a great location and has many great features. However, I am still a student with a limited budget. I am willing to pay 400 euros per month for this apartment. I will be a dependable and responsible tenant. I will always pay the rent on time and maintain the apartment in good condition.
name: Haoyu Wang from China

content: Thank you for your offer, Haoyu. However, 400 euros per month is still too low for this apartment. It's a newly built unfurnished 50 square meter one-bedroom apartment in the city center. It's close to all important facilities like supermarket, public transportation, etc. I understand that you are a student and you have a limited budget, but I need to get a fair market price for my apartment. Let's discuss the features of the apartment again. It's a great apartment with a lot of value. I'm sure we can find a price that works for both of us.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: Mister Schmidt, I appreciate your patience. I understand that the apartment is of great value. I am willing to pay 450 euros per month for this apartment. I am a reliable and responsible person. I will always pay the rent on time and maintain the apartment in good condition. I am confident that I will be a great tenant.
name: Haoyu Wang from China

content: Thank you for your offer, Haoyu. I appreciate your understanding of the value of this apartment. 450 euros per month is getting closer to the fair market price, but it's still not enough for this apartment. It's a newly built unfurnished 50 square meter one-bedroom apartment in the city center. It's close to all important facilities like supermarket, public transportation, etc. Let's discuss the features of the apartment again. It's a great apartment with a lot of value. I'm sure we can find a price that works for both of us.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: Mister Schmidt, I understand that the apartment is of great value. I am willing to pay 500 euros per month for this apartment. I am a reliable and responsible person. I will always pay the rent on time and maintain the apartment in good condition. I am confident that I will be a great tenant.
name: Haoyu Wang from China

content: Thank you for your offer, Haoyu. I appreciate your understanding of the value of this apartment. 500 euros per month is a fair market price for this apartment. I agree to the price of 500 euros per month. Congratulations, we have a deal.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: I agree to the price of 500 euros per month!
name: Haoyu Wang from China
